description.narrative:
The overall objective of this task is to rethink and design the new modality to replace the MFA’s Information Pool and the Engagement Pool as of April 1st 2022.
The new modality is intended to strengthen public engagement in Denmark — especially with the Danes who are not already knowledgeable of and engaged in the area.
Once the new design is developed, the second part of the task is to prepare and assist the MFA in an open tender of the fund management/administrator of the new modality. A future fund manager/administrator should have sufficient organisational capacity and experience with civil society management, international development cooperation as well as experience in communication, journalism and understanding of the target groups.
